msg: My name is Henrik Gerdes. I'm a total nerd for information technology and have an absolute passion for solving specific, difficult and large-scale problems in computer science and project management. I love finding elegant & efficient ways to automate recurring tasks and provide their functionality to in a user-friendly way to other people. Abstraction ForTheWin üôå. I studied computer science at the University of Osnabr√ºck (Germany) where I learnd many low-level concepts for programming and architectural design. I did some projects with computer/game graphics, low-level socket programming, graph algorithms and implemented some algorithms for traditional AI problems. But most importantly, I acquired the skill for strategical problem-solving. While writing my bachelor's thesis on applying DevOps principles to the software development process, I worked at a local software company implementing these principles.

Now I'm still working at that local IT company as a Systems/DevOps engineer. I developed a new deployment strategy and designed the entire monitoring, alerting, maintenance and backup system - primary based on OpenSource software. Right now I'm implementing ChatOps practices and expanding my knowledge of different cloud provider technologies, while further improving automated resource provisioning, monitoring, and maintenance tasks.
I love experimenting with different technologies and sharing my knowledge with others, even though if it might involve spending some quality time with your favorite rubber ü¶Ü.
Check out my Blog where I document some of my experiences!
